party.title: Party
party.musicContent:
We want to hear your favorite songs!

Please share your suggestions with us and we may include them at the party.
party.dressCodeNote: White is reserved for the bride.

information.noKidsContent:
In order for everyone to have a great time, we kindly ask that you make arrangements for your children.

 Thank you for understanding.
information.giftListsContent: Your presence is the best gift we could ask for, but if you would like to contribute to our gift lists, you can find them below.
information.bankInfoContent: If you prefer to make a bank transfer, you can find our account information below.

footer.header: We hope you'll join us on our special day!
footer.content: Please share your favorite moments with us on social media using the hashtag below
